title: Internship help!!!
body:
I don't know where else to turn, so I apologize if this isn't the right way to go about this. I am trying to sign up for one of the Internships for this summer, but when I went to fill out the application I found out that my college, Colorado Mountain College, isn't listed in their college drop down menu. Since this is a required field I have no idea what to do. I don't what to lie on my application but I also need to get my application in by today, and I have been working all week to get my cover letter and resume polished for this application. My best hope at this point is that a rioter sees this and helps me solve this problem.
Help Riot Games, you're my only hope.

replies.body: Hey there, the application isn't the most intuitive.  Sorry about that!  There should actually be an option for Other.  ^^ I hope that helps and best of luck!
Thank you so much for the help!!
best of luck. In the future I'd recommend emailing the company/whatever email they give for questions about the application AND maybe not waiting until the last day to ask?
I found out about this internship on a fluke last Saturday, and they didn't offer an email on the application, otherwise I would have. Thank you for your input though.
